title: Ticket #1537: Improper escaping of error messages in nordugrid gahp
description:
When passing error messages from the gridftp library back to the gridmanager, the nordugrid gahp converts newlines to spaces. It does this because the error messages often end up in the HoldReason attribute of the job ad, and the schedd can't handle newlines in attribute values. But the gahp doesn't escape these spaces, which makes the gridmanager unable to parse the gahp's response, causing the gridmanager to EXCEPT.

The escape_err_msg() function in the nordugrid gahp needs to be fixed to properly escape any spaces generated because of newlines.
